resources.string:
-NOTICE: To change screens press MENU/Edit

-NOTICE: To enable ORIENTATION, disable PERSISTENCE.

-REMEMBER: You can hide apps from the drawer by using the custom catalogs (press menu key while the drawer is open)

Version 1.1.4:
--------------
-Fixed some FCs when editing screens.
-Fixed dockbar reordering (again).
-Added this changelog window.
-Added confirmation popup to "reset settings" preference.
